titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Loudoun County Public Schools Archeological Surveys, 1998-2013
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Thomas Balch Library M 097

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Loudoun County Public Schools Archeological Surveys, 1998-2013
did.abstract: The collection consists of archeological investigations of properties under consideration as sites for new public school facilities in Loudoun County. One report is a history of desegregation in Loudoun County Public Schools and, in particular, Douglass Elementary School. The reports were commissioned by Loudoun County Public Schools, consultants, or developers.
did.origination: Loudoun County Public Schools, Ashburn, VA.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: No physical characteristics affect use of this material.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Loudoun County Public Schools Archeological Surveys (M097), Thomas Balch Library, Leesburg, VA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Loudoun County Public Schools, Ashburn, VA.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Cultural resource investigations are performed prior to the construction of public school facilities. The primary purpose of the reports is to locate and identify archeological sites, historic standing structures, and other cultural resources in order to determine their significance for eligibility for the National Register of Historic Places.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of archeological investigations of properties under consideration as sites for new public school facilities in Loudoun County. One report is a history of desegregation in Loudoun County Public Schools and, in particular, Douglass Elementary School. The reports were commissioned by Loudoun County Public Schools, consultants, or developers. The reports are organized chronologically. When possible, the name of the school built (or to-be-built) on the site has been included. The collection also contains a USB drive with electronic copies of the reports.

p.bibref: Loudoun County Public Schools Archeological Surveys (M 097), Thomas Balch Library, Leesburg, VA.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Research Materials Regarding Decision to Replace Frederick Douglass Elementary School, Leesburg, VA 1938-1971 (M 073), Thomas Balch Library, Leesburg, VA.
